   21: -module(eldap_basic_SUITE).

   27:          add_when_not_bound/1,
   28:          app/1,
   29:          appup/1,
   30:          bind/1,
   31:          client_side_add_timeout/1,
   32:          client_side_bind_timeout/1,
   33:          client_side_search_timeout/1,
   34:          client_side_start_tls_timeout/1,
   35:          close_after_tcp_error/1,
   36:          close_ret_val/1,
   37:          decode/1,
   38:          delete/1,
   39:          delete_referral/1,
   40:          elementary_search/1,
   41:          encode/1,
   42:          modify/1,
   43:          modify_dn_delete_old/1,
   44:          modify_dn_keep_old/1,
   45:          modify_referral/1,
   46:          more_add/1,
   47:          open_ret_val_error/1,
   48:          open_ret_val_success/1,
   49:          plain_ldap_socket_info/1,
   50:          search_filter_and/1,
   51:          search_filter_and_not/1,
   52:          search_filter_equalityMatch/1,
   53:          search_filter_equalityMatch_objectClass_exists/1,
   54:          search_filter_final/1,
   55:          search_filter_initial/1,
   56:          search_filter_or/1,
   57:          search_filter_or_sizelimit_ok/1,
   58:          search_filter_or_sizelimit_exceeded/1,
   59:          search_filter_substring_any/1,
   60:          search_non_existant/1,
   61:          search_referral/1,
   62:          search_two_hits/1,
   63:          search_extensible_match_with_dn/1,
   64:          search_extensible_match_without_dn/1,
   65:          search_paged_results/1,
   66:          ssl_connection/1,
   67:          ssl_conn_socket_info/1,
   68:          start_tls_on_ssl_should_fail/1,
   69:          start_tls_twice_should_fail/1,
   70:          tcp_connection/1,
   71:          tcp_connection_option/1
   72:         ]).
   73: 
   74: -export([
   75:          all/0,
   76:          end_per_group/2,
   77:          end_per_suite/1,
   78:          end_per_testcase/2,
   79:          groups/0,
   80:          init_per_group/2,
   81:          init_per_suite/1,
   82:          init_per_testcase/2,
   83:          suite/0
   84:         ]).
   85: 
   86: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   87: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   88: -include_lib("eldap/include/eldap.hrl").
   89: -include_lib("eldap/ebin/ELDAPv3.hrl").
   90: 
   91: 
   92: %% Control to delete a referral object:
   93: -define(manageDsaIT, {control,"2.16.840.1.113730.3.4.2",false,asn1_NOVALUE}).
   94: 
   95: suite() ->
   96:     [{timetrap,{seconds,360}}].
   97: 
   98: all() ->
   99:     [app,
  100:      appup,
  101:      {group, encode_decode},
  102:      {group, return_values},
  103:      {group, v4_connections},
  104:      {group, v6_connections},
  105:      {group, plain_api},
  106:      {group, ssl_api},
  107:      {group, start_tls_api}
  108:     ].
  109: 
  110: groups() ->
  111:     [{encode_decode, [], [encode,
  112: 			  decode
  113: 			  ]},
  114:      {plain_api,     [], [{group,api}]},
  115:      {ssl_api,       [], [{group,api}, start_tls_on_ssl_should_fail]},
  116:      {start_tls_api, [], [{group,api}, start_tls_twice_should_fail]},
  117: 
  118:      {api, [], [{group,api_not_bound},
  119: 		{group,api_bound}]},
  120: 
  121:      {api_not_bound, [], [elementary_search, search_non_existant,
  122: 			  add_when_not_bound,
  123: 			  bind]},
  124:      {api_bound, [], [add_when_bound,
  125: 		      add_already_exists,
  126: 		      more_add,
  127: 		      add_referral,
  128: 		      search_filter_equalityMatch,
  129:                       search_filter_equalityMatch_objectClass_exists,
  130: 		      search_filter_substring_any,
  131: 		      search_filter_initial,
  132: 		      search_filter_final,
  133: 		      search_filter_and,
  134: 		      search_filter_or,
  135: 		      search_filter_and_not,
  136: 		      search_two_hits,
  137: 		      search_extensible_match_with_dn,
  138: 		      search_extensible_match_without_dn,
  139: 		      search_referral,
  140:                       search_filter_or_sizelimit_ok,
  141:                       search_filter_or_sizelimit_exceeded,
  142:                       search_paged_results,
  143: 		      modify,
  144: 		      modify_referral,
  145: 		      delete,
  146: 		      delete_referral,
  147: 		      modify_dn_delete_old,
  148: 		      modify_dn_keep_old]},
  149:      {v4_connections, [], connection_tests()},
  150:      {v6_connections, [], connection_tests()},
  151:      {return_values, [], [open_ret_val_success,
  152: 			  open_ret_val_error,
  153: 			  close_ret_val]}
  154:     ].
  155: 
  156: connection_tests() ->
  157:     [tcp_connection,
  158:      tcp_connection_option,
  159:      ssl_connection,
  160:      client_side_start_tls_timeout,
  161:      client_side_bind_timeout,
  162:      client_side_add_timeout,
  163:      client_side_search_timeout,
  164:      close_after_tcp_error,
  165:      ssl_conn_socket_info,
  166:      plain_ldap_socket_info
  167:     ].
  168: 
  169: 
  170: ldap_servers(_Config) ->
  171:     ["ulrad",
  172:      "orome",
  173:      "ecthelion",
  174:      "bifur"
  175:     ].
  176: 
  177: 
  178: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  179:     SSL_available = init_ssl_certs_et_al(Config),
  180:     ServerHosts = ["localhost" | random_sorted(ldap_servers(Config))],
  181:     LDAP_server =  find_first_server(false,
  182:                                      [{H,9876} || H <- ServerHosts]),
  183: 
  184:     LDAPS_server =
  185: 	case SSL_available of
  186: 	    true ->
  187: 		find_first_server(true,
  188:                                   [{H,9877} || H <- ServerHosts]);
  189: 	    false ->
  190: 		undefined
  191: 	end,
  192:     log_ldap_servers([{ssl_available, SSL_available},
  193:                       {ldap_server,   LDAP_server},
  194:                       {ldaps_server,  LDAPS_server} | Config]).
  195: 
  196: 
  197: log_ldap_servers(Config) ->
  198:     case true == (catch
  199:                       lists:member({save_eldap_data,3},
  200:                                    eldap_collect_labmachine_info_SUITE:module_info(exports)))
  201:     of
  202:         true ->
  203:             HostName = 
  204:                 case inet:gethostname() of
  205:                     {ok,Name} -> string:to_lower(Name);
  206:                     _ -> "undefined"
  207:                 end,
  208:             Entry =
  209:                      [{hostname,           HostName},
  210:                       {type,               host},
  211:                       {date,               date()},
  212:                       {time,               time()},
  213:                       {os_type,            os:type()},
  214:                       {os_version,         os:version()},
  215:                       {ldap_server,        proplists:get_value(ldap_server, Config)},
  216:                       {ldaps_server,       proplists:get_value(ldaps_server, Config)}
  217:                      ],
  218:             eldap_collect_labmachine_info_SUITE:save_eldap_data(HostName, Entry, Config),
  219:             Config;
  220:         false ->
  221:             Config
  222:     end.
  223: 
  224: 
  225: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  226:     try ssl:stop()
  227:     catch
  228:         _:_ -> ok
  229:     end.
  230: 
  231: 
  232: init_per_group(return_values, Config) ->
  233:     case proplists:get_value(ldap_server,Config) of
  234: 	undefined ->
  235: 	    {skip, "LDAP server not available"};
  236: 	{Host,Port} ->
  237: 	    ct:comment("ldap://~s:~p",[Host,Port]),
  238: 	    Config
  239:     end;
  240: init_per_group(plain_api, Config0) ->
  241:     case proplists:get_value(ldap_server,Config0) of
  242: 	undefined ->
  243: 	    {skip, "LDAP server not available"};
  244: 	Server = {Host,Port} ->
  245: 	    ct:comment("ldap://~s:~p",[Host,Port]),
  246: 	    initialize_db([{server,Server}, {ssl_flag,false}, {start_tls,false} | Config0])
  247:     end;
  248: init_per_group(ssl_api, Config0) ->
  249:     case proplists:get_value(ldaps_server,Config0) of
  250: 	undefined ->
  251: 	    {skip, "LDAPS server not available"};
  252: 	Server = {Host,Port} ->
  253: 	    ct:comment("ldaps://~s:~p",[Host,Port]),
  254: 	    initialize_db([{server,Server}, {ssl_flag,true}, {start_tls,false} | Config0])
  255:     end;
  256: init_per_group(start_tls_api, Config0) ->
  257:     case {proplists:get_value(ldap_server,Config0), proplists:get_value(ssl_available,Config0)} of
  258: 	{undefined,true} ->
  259: 	    {skip, "LDAP server not available"};
  260: 	{_,false} ->
  261: 	    {skip, "TLS not available"};
  262: 	{Server={Host,Port}, true} ->
  263: 	    ct:comment("ldap://~s:~p + start_tls",[Host,Port]),
  264: 	    Config = [{server,Server}, {ssl_flag,false} | Config0],
  265: 	    case supported_extension("1.3.6.1.4.1.1466.20037", Config) of
  266: 		true -> initialize_db([{start_tls,true} | Config]);
  267: 		false -> {skip, "start_tls not supported according to the server"}
  268: 	    end
  269:     end;
  270: init_per_group(v4_connections, Config) ->
  271:     [{tcp_listen_opts,  [{reuseaddr, true}]},
  272:      {listen_host,  "localhost"},
  273:      {tcp_connect_opts, []}
  274:      |  Config];
  275: init_per_group(v6_connections, Config) ->
  276:     {ok, Hostname} = inet:gethostname(),
  277:     case lists:member(list_to_atom(Hostname), ct:get_config(ipv6_hosts,[])) of
  278: 	true -> 
  279: 	    [{tcp_listen_opts,  [inet6,{reuseaddr, true}]},
  280: 	     {listen_host,  "::"},
  281: 	     {tcp_connect_opts, [{tcpopts,[inet6]}]}
  282: 	     |  Config];
  283: 	false ->
  284: 	    {skip, io_lib:format("~p is not an ipv6_host",[Hostname])}
  285:     end;
  286: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
  287:     Config.
  288: 
  289: end_per_group(plain_api,     Config) -> clear_db(Config);
  290: end_per_group(ssl_api,       Config) -> clear_db(Config);
  291: end_per_group(start_tls_api, Config) -> clear_db(Config);
  292: end_per_group(_Group, Config) -> Config.
  293: 
  294: 
  295: init_per_testcase(TC, Config) when TC == ssl_connection; TC == ssl_conn_socket_info ->
  296:     case proplists:get_value(ssl_available,Config) of
  297: 	true ->
  298: 	    SSL_Port = 9999,
  299: 	    CertFile = filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config), "certs/server/cert.pem"),
  300: 	    KeyFile = filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config), "certs/server/key.pem"),
  301: 
  302: 	    Parent = self(),
  303: 	    Listener = spawn_link(
  304: 			 fun() ->
  305: 				 case ssl:listen(SSL_Port, [{certfile, CertFile},
  306: 							    {keyfile, KeyFile}
  307: 							    | proplists:get_value(tcp_listen_opts,Config)
  308: 							   ]) of
  309: 				     {ok,SSL_LSock} ->
  310: 					 Parent ! {ok,self()},
  311: 					 (fun L() ->
  312: 						ct:log("ssl server waiting for connections...",[]),
  313: 						{ok, S} = ssl:transport_accept(SSL_LSock),
  314: 						ct:log("ssl:transport_accept/1 ok",[]),
  315:                                                 {ok,_} = ssl:handshake(S),
  316: 						ct:log("ssl:handshake/1 ok",[]),
  317: 						L()
  318: 				          end)();
  319: 				     Other ->
  320: 					 Parent ! {not_ok,Other,self()}
  321: 				 end
  322: 			 end),
  323: 	    receive
  324: 		{ok,Listener} ->
  325: 		    ct:log("SSL listening to port ~p (process ~p)",[SSL_Port, Listener]),
  326: 		    [{ssl_listener,Listener},
  327: 		     {ssl_listen_port,SSL_Port},
  328: 		     {ssl_connect_opts,[{verify, verify_none}]}
  329: 		     | Config];
  330: 		{no_ok,SSL_Other,Listener} ->
  331: 		    ct:log("ssl:listen on port ~p failed: ~p",[SSL_Port,SSL_Other]),
  332: 		    {fail, "ssl:listen/2 failed"}
  333: 	    after 5000 ->
  334: 		    {fail, "Waiting for ssl:listen timeout"}
  335: 	    end;
  336: 	false ->
  337: 	    {skip, "ssl not available"}
  338:     end;
  339: 
  340: init_per_testcase(TC, Config) ->
  341:     case lists:member(TC,connection_tests()) of
  342: 	true ->
  343: 	    case gen_tcp:listen(0, proplists:get_value(tcp_listen_opts,Config)) of
  344: 		{ok,LSock} ->
  345: 		    {ok,{_,Port}} = inet:sockname(LSock),
  346: 		    [{listen_socket,LSock},
  347: 		     {listen_port,Port}
  348: 		     | Config];
  349: 		Other ->
  350: 		    {fail, Other}
  351: 	    end;
  352: 
  353: 	false ->
  354: 	    case proplists:get_value(name,proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config)) of
  355: 		api_not_bound ->
  356: 		    {ok,H} = open(Config),
  357: 		    [{handle,H} | Config];
  358: 		api_bound ->
  359: 		    {ok,H} = open(Config),
  360: 		    ok = eldap:simple_bind(H,
  361: 					   "cn=Manager,dc=ericsson,dc=se",
  362: 					   "hejsan"),
  363: 		    [{handle,H} | Config];
  364: 		_Name ->
  365: 		    Config
  366: 	    end
  367:     end.
  368: 
  369: end_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
  370:     catch gen_tcp:close( proplists:get_value(listen_socket, Config) ),
  371:     catch eldap:close( proplists:get_value(handle,Config) ).
  372: 
  373: 
  374: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  375: %%%
  376: %%% Test cases
  377: %%%
  378: 
  379: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  380: %%% Test that the eldap app file is ok
  381: app(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  382:     ok = test_server:app_test(eldap).
  383: 
  384: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  385: %%% Test that the eldap appup file is ok
  386: appup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  387:     ok = test_server:appup_test(eldap).
  388: 
  389: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  390: open_ret_val_success(Config) ->
  391:     {Host,Port} = proplists:get_value(ldap_server,Config),
  392:     {ok,H} = eldap:open([Host], [{port,Port}]),
  393:     catch eldap:close(H).
  394: 
  395: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  396: open_ret_val_error(_Config) ->
  397:     {error,_} = eldap:open(["nohost.example.com"], [{port,65535}]).
  398: 
  399: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  400: close_ret_val(Config) ->
  401:     {Host,Port} = proplists:get_value(ldap_server,Config),
  402:     {ok,H} = eldap:open([Host], [{port,Port}]),
  403:     ok = eldap:close(H).
  404: 
  405: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  406: tcp_connection(Config) ->
  407:     Host = proplists:get_value(listen_host, Config),
  408:     Port = proplists:get_value(listen_port, Config),
  409:     Opts = proplists:get_value(tcp_connect_opts, Config),
  410:     case eldap:open([Host], [{port,Port}|Opts]) of
  411: 	{ok,_H} ->
  412: 	    Sl = proplists:get_value(listen_socket, Config),
  413: 	    case gen_tcp:accept(Sl,1000) of
  414: 		{ok,_S} -> ok;
  415: 		{error,timeout} -> ct:fail("server side accept timeout",[]);
  416: 		Other -> ct:fail("gen_tdp:accept failed: ~p",[Other])
  417: 	    end;
  418: 	Other -> ct:fail("eldap:open failed: ~p",[Other])
  419:     end.
  420: 
  421: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  422: close_after_tcp_error(Config) ->
  423:     Host = proplists:get_value(listen_host, Config),
  424:     Port = proplists:get_value(listen_port, Config),
  425:     Opts = proplists:get_value(tcp_connect_opts, Config),
  426:     T = 1000,
  427:     case eldap:open([Host], [{timeout,T},{port,Port}|Opts]) of
  428:     {ok,H} ->
  429:         Sl = proplists:get_value(listen_socket, Config),
  430:         gen_tcp:close(Sl),
  431:         {error,{gen_tcp_error,closed}} = eldap:simple_bind(H, anon, anon),
  432:         ok = eldap:close(H),
  433:         wait_for_close(H);
  434:     Other -> ct:fail("eldap:open failed: ~p",[Other])
  435:     end.
  436: 
  437: wait_for_close(H) ->
  438:     case erlang:is_process_alive(H) of
  439:         true  -> timer:sleep(100),
  440:                  wait_for_close(H);
  441:         false -> ok
  442:     end.
  443: 
  444: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  445: ssl_connection(Config) ->
  446:     Host = proplists:get_value(listen_host, Config),
  447:     Port = proplists:get_value(ssl_listen_port, Config),
  448:     Opts = proplists:get_value(tcp_connect_opts, Config),
  449:     SSLOpts = proplists:get_value(ssl_connect_opts, Config),
  450:     case eldap:open([Host], [{port,Port},
  451: 			     {ssl,true},
  452: 			     {timeout,5000},
  453: 			     {sslopts,SSLOpts}|Opts]) of
  454: 	{ok,_H} -> ok;
  455: 	Other -> ct:fail("eldap:open failed: ~p",[Other])
  456:     end.
  457: 
  458: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  459: ssl_conn_socket_info(Config) ->
  460:     Host = proplists:get_value(listen_host, Config),
  461:     Port = proplists:get_value(ssl_listen_port, Config),
  462:     Opts = proplists:get_value(tcp_connect_opts, Config),
  463:     SSLOpts = proplists:get_value(ssl_connect_opts, Config),
  464:     case eldap:open([Host], [{port,Port},
  465: 			     {ssl,true},
  466: 			     {timeout,5000},
  467: 			     {sslopts,SSLOpts}|Opts]) of
  468: 	{ok,H} ->
  469:             #{socket := Socket, socket_type := ssl} = eldap:info(H),
  470:             ?assertMatch({ok, _Data}, ssl:connection_information(Socket));
  471: 	Other -> ct:fail("eldap:open failed: ~p",[Other])
  472:     end.
  473: 
  474: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  475: plain_ldap_socket_info(Config) ->
  476:     Host = proplists:get_value(listen_host, Config),
  477:     Port = proplists:get_value(listen_port, Config),
  478:     Opts = proplists:get_value(tcp_connect_opts, Config),
  479:     T = 1000,
  480:     case eldap:open([Host], [{timeout,T},{port,Port}|Opts]) of
  481:         {ok,H} ->
  482:             ?assertMatch(#{socket := _, socket_type := tcp},
  483:                           eldap:info(H));
  484:         Other -> ct:fail("eldap:open failed: ~p",[Other])
  485:     end.
  486: 
  487: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  488: client_side_add_timeout(Config) ->
  489:     client_timeout(
  490:       fun(H) ->
  491: 	      eldap:add(H, "cn=Foo Bar,dc=host,dc=ericsson,dc=se",
  492: 			[{"objectclass", ["person"]},
  493: 			 {"cn", ["Foo Bar"]},
  494: 			 {"sn", ["Bar"]},
  495: 			 {"telephoneNumber", ["555-1232", "555-5432"]}])
  496:       end, Config).
  497: 
  498: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  499: client_side_bind_timeout(Config) ->
  500:     client_timeout(
  501:       fun(H) ->
  502: 	      eldap:simple_bind(H, anon, anon)
  503:       end, Config).
  504: 
  505: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  506: client_side_search_timeout(Config) ->
  507:     client_timeout(
  508:       fun(H) ->
  509: 	      eldap:search(H, [{base,"dc=host,dc=ericsson,dc=se"},
  510: 			       {filter, eldap:present("objectclass")},
  511: 			       {scope,  eldap:wholeSubtree()}])
  512:       end, Config).
  513: 
  514: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  515: client_side_start_tls_timeout(Config) ->
  516:     client_timeout(
  517:       fun(H) ->
  518: 	      eldap:start_tls(H, [])
  519:       end, Config).
  520: 
  521: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  522: tcp_connection_option(Config) ->
  523:     Host = proplists:get_value(listen_host, Config),
  524:     Port = proplists:get_value(listen_port, Config),
  525:     Opts = proplists:get_value(tcp_connect_opts, Config),
  526:     Sl = proplists:get_value(listen_socket, Config),
  527: 
  528:     %% Make an option value to test.  The option must be implemented on all
  529:     %% platforms that we test on.  Must check what the default value is
  530:     %% so we don't happen to choose that particular value.
  531:     {ok,[{linger,DefaultLinger}]} = inet:getopts(Sl, [linger]),
  532:     TestLinger = case DefaultLinger of
  533: 		     {false,_} -> {true,5};
  534: 		     {true,_} -> {false,0}
  535: 		 end,
  536: 
  537:     case catch eldap:open([Host],
  538: 			  [{port,Port},{tcpopts,[{linger,TestLinger}]}|Opts]) of
  539: 	{ok,H} ->
  540: 	    case gen_tcp:accept(Sl,1000) of
  541: 		{ok,_} ->
  542: 		    case eldap:getopts(H, [{tcpopts,[linger]}]) of
  543: 			{ok,[{tcpopts,[{linger,ActualLinger}]}]} ->
  544: 			    case ActualLinger of
  545: 				TestLinger ->
  546: 				    ok;
  547: 				DefaultLinger ->
  548: 				    ct:fail("eldap:getopts: 'linger' didn't change,"
  549: 					    " got ~p (=default) expected ~p",
  550: 					    [ActualLinger,TestLinger]);
  551: 				_ ->
  552: 				    ct:fail("eldap:getopts: bad 'linger', got ~p expected ~p",
  553: 					    [ActualLinger,TestLinger])
  554: 			    end;
  555: 			Other ->
  556: 			    ct:fail("eldap:getopts: bad result ~p",[Other])
  557: 		    end;
  558: 		{error,timeout} ->
  559: 		    ct:fail("server side accept timeout",[])
  560: 	    end;
  561: 
  562: 	Other ->
  563: 	    ct:fail("eldap:open failed: ~p",[Other])
  564:     end.
  565: 
  566: 
  567: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  568: %%% Basic test that all api functions works as expected
  569: 
  570: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  571: elementary_search(Config) ->
  572:     {ok, #eldap_search_result{entries=[_]}} =
  573: 	eldap:search(proplists:get_value(handle,Config),
  574: 		     #eldap_search{base  = proplists:get_value(eldap_path, Config),
  575: 				   filter= eldap:present("objectclass"),
  576: 				   scope = eldap:wholeSubtree()}).
  577: 
  578: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  579: search_non_existant(Config) ->
  580:     {error, noSuchObject} =
  581: 	eldap:search(proplists:get_value(handle,Config),
  582: 		     #eldap_search{base  = "cn=Bar," ++ proplists:get_value(eldap_path, Config),
  583: 				   filter= eldap:present("objectclass"),
  584: 				   scope = eldap:wholeSubtree()}).
  585: 
  586: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  587: add_when_not_bound(Config) ->
  588:     {error, _} = eldap:add(proplists:get_value(handle,Config),
  589: 			   "cn=Jonas Jonsson," ++ proplists:get_value(eldap_path, Config),
  590: 			   [{"objectclass", ["person"]},
  591: 			    {"cn", ["Jonas Jonsson"]},
  592: 			    {"sn", ["Jonsson"]}]).
  593: 
  594: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  595: bind(Config) ->
  596:     ok = eldap:simple_bind(proplists:get_value(handle,Config),
  597: 			   "cn=Manager,dc=ericsson,dc=se",
  598: 			   "hejsan").
  599: 
  600: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  601: add_when_bound(Config) ->
  602:     ok = eldap:add(proplists:get_value(handle, Config),
  603: 		   "cn=Jonas Jonsson," ++  proplists:get_value(eldap_path, Config),
  604: 		   [{"objectclass", ["person"]},
  605: 		    {"cn", ["Jonas Jonsson"]},
  606: 		    {"sn", ["Jonsson"]}]).
  607: 
  608: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  609: add_already_exists(Config) ->
  610:     {error, entryAlreadyExists} =
  611: 	eldap:add(proplists:get_value(handle, Config),
  612: 		  "cn=Jonas Jonsson," ++ proplists:get_value(eldap_path, Config),
  613: 		  [{"objectclass", ["person"]},
  614: 		   {"cn", ["Jonas Jonsson"]},
  615: 		   {"sn", ["Jonsson"]}]).
  616: 
  617: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  618: more_add(Config) ->
  619:     H = proplists:get_value(handle, Config),
  620:     BasePath = proplists:get_value(eldap_path, Config),
  621:     ok = eldap:add(H, "cn=Foo Bar," ++ BasePath,
  622: 		   [{"objectclass", ["person"]},
  623: 		    {"cn", ["Foo Bar"]},
  624: 		    {"sn", ["Bar"]},
  625: 		    {"telephoneNumber", ["555-1232", "555-5432"]}]),
  626:     ok = eldap:add(H, "ou=Team," ++ BasePath,
  627: 		   [{"objectclass", ["organizationalUnit"]},
  628: 		    {"ou", ["Team"]}]).
  629: 
  630: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  631: add_referral(Config) ->
  632:     H = proplists:get_value(handle, Config),
  633:     BasePath = proplists:get_value(eldap_path, Config),
  634:     {ok,{referral,["ldap://nowhere.example.com"++_]}} =
  635: 	eldap:add(H, "cn=Foo Bar,dc=notHere," ++ BasePath,
  636: 		  [{"objectclass", ["person"]},
  637: 		   {"cn", ["Foo Bar"]},
  638: 		   {"sn", ["Bar"]},
  639: 		   {"telephoneNumber", ["555-1232", "555-5432"]}]).
  640: 
  641: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  642: search_filter_equalityMatch(Config) ->
  643:     BasePath = proplists:get_value(eldap_path, Config),
  644:     ExpectedDN = "cn=Jonas Jonsson," ++ BasePath,
  645:     {ok, #eldap_search_result{entries=[#eldap_entry{object_name=ExpectedDN}]}} =
  646: 	eldap:search(proplists:get_value(handle, Config),
  647: 		     #eldap_search{base = BasePath,
  648: 				   filter = eldap:equalityMatch("sn", "Jonsson"),
  649: 				   scope=eldap:singleLevel()}).
  650: 
  651: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  652: search_filter_equalityMatch_objectClass_exists(Config) ->
  653:     BasePath = proplists:get_value(eldap_path, Config),
  654:     ExpectedDN = "cn=Jonas Jonsson," ++ BasePath,
  655:     {ok, #eldap_search_result{entries=[#eldap_entry{object_name=ExpectedDN}]}} =
  656: 	eldap:search(proplists:get_value(handle, Config),
  657: 		     #eldap_search{base = BasePath,
  658: 				   filter = eldap:'and'([eldap:equalityMatch("sn", "Jonsson"),
  659:                                                          eldap:present("objectclass")]),
  660: 				   scope=eldap:singleLevel()}).
  661: 
  662: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  663: search_filter_substring_any(Config) ->
  664:     BasePath = proplists:get_value(eldap_path, Config),
  665:     ExpectedDN = "cn=Jonas Jonsson," ++ BasePath,
  666:     {ok, #eldap_search_result{entries=[#eldap_entry{object_name=ExpectedDN}]}} =
  667: 	eldap:search(proplists:get_value(handle, Config),
  668: 		     #eldap_search{base = BasePath,
  669: 				   filter = eldap:substrings("sn", [{any, "ss"}]),
  670: 				   scope=eldap:singleLevel()}).
  671: 
  672: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  673: search_filter_initial(Config) ->
  674:     H = proplists:get_value(handle, Config),
  675:     BasePath = proplists:get_value(eldap_path, Config),
  676:     ExpectedDN = "cn=Foo Bar," ++ BasePath,
  677:     {ok, #eldap_search_result{entries=[#eldap_entry{object_name=ExpectedDN}]}} =
  678: 	eldap:search(H,
  679: 		     #eldap_search{base = BasePath,
  680: 				   filter = eldap:substrings("sn", [{initial, "B"}]),
  681: 				   scope=eldap:singleLevel()}).
  682: 
  683: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  684: search_filter_final(Config) ->
  685:     H = proplists:get_value(handle, Config),
  686:     BasePath = proplists:get_value(eldap_path, Config),
  687:     ExpectedDN = "cn=Foo Bar," ++ BasePath,
  688:     {ok, #eldap_search_result{entries=[#eldap_entry{object_name=ExpectedDN}]}} =
  689: 	eldap:search(H,
  690: 		     #eldap_search{base = BasePath,
  691: 				   filter = eldap:substrings("sn", [{final, "r"}]),
  692: 				   scope=eldap:singleLevel()}).
  693: 
  694: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  695: search_filter_and(Config) ->
  696:     H = proplists:get_value(handle, Config),
  697:     BasePath = proplists:get_value(eldap_path, Config),
  698:     ExpectedDN = "cn=Foo Bar," ++ BasePath,
  699:     {ok, #eldap_search_result{entries=[#eldap_entry{object_name=ExpectedDN}]}} =
  700: 	eldap:search(H,
  701: 		     #eldap_search{base = BasePath,
  702: 				   filter = eldap:'and'([eldap:substrings("sn", [{any, "a"}]),
  703: 							 eldap:equalityMatch("cn","Foo Bar")]),
  704: 				   scope=eldap:singleLevel()}).
  705: 
  706: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  707: search_filter_or(Config) ->
  708:     H = proplists:get_value(handle, Config),
  709:     BasePath = proplists:get_value(eldap_path, Config),
  710:     ExpectedDNs = lists:sort(["cn=Foo Bar," ++ BasePath,
  711: 			      "ou=Team," ++ BasePath]),
  712:     {ok, #eldap_search_result{entries=Es}} =
  713: 	eldap:search(H,
  714: 		     #eldap_search{base = BasePath,
  715: 				   filter = eldap:'or'([eldap:substrings("sn", [{any, "a"}]),
  716: 							eldap:equalityMatch("ou","Team")]),
  717: 				   scope=eldap:singleLevel()}),
  718:     ExpectedDNs = lists:sort([DN || #eldap_entry{object_name=DN} <- Es]).
  719: 
  720: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  721: search_filter_or_sizelimit_ok(Config) ->
  722:     H = proplists:get_value(handle, Config),
  723:     BasePath = proplists:get_value(eldap_path, Config),
  724:     ExpectedDNs = lists:sort(["cn=Foo Bar," ++ BasePath,
  725: 			      "ou=Team," ++ BasePath]),
  726:     {ok, #eldap_search_result{entries=Es}} =
  727: 	eldap:search(H,
  728: 		     #eldap_search{base = BasePath,
  729: 				   filter = eldap:'or'([eldap:substrings("sn", [{any, "a"}]),
  730: 							eldap:equalityMatch("ou","Team")]),
  731:                                    size_limit = 2,
  732: 				   scope=eldap:singleLevel()}),
  733:     ExpectedDNs = lists:sort([DN || #eldap_entry{object_name=DN} <- Es]).
  734: 
  735: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  736: search_filter_or_sizelimit_exceeded(Config) ->
  737:     H = proplists:get_value(handle, Config),
  738:     BasePath = proplists:get_value(eldap_path, Config),
  739:     %% The quesry without the {size_limit,1} option would return two answers:
  740:     ExpectedDNs = ["cn=Foo Bar," ++ BasePath,
  741:                    "ou=Team," ++ BasePath],
  742:     %% Expect exact one of the two answers, but we don't know which:
  743:     {ok, #eldap_search_result{entries=[E]}} =
  744: 	eldap:search(H,
  745: 		     #eldap_search{base = BasePath,
  746: 				   filter = eldap:'or'([eldap:substrings("sn", [{any, "a"}]),
  747: 							eldap:equalityMatch("ou","Team")]),
  748:                                    size_limit = 1,
  749: 				   scope=eldap:singleLevel()}),
  750:     #eldap_entry{object_name=DN} = E,
  751:     true = lists:member(DN, ExpectedDNs).
  752: 
  753: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  754: search_filter_and_not(Config) ->
  755:     H = proplists:get_value(handle, Config),
  756:     BasePath = proplists:get_value(eldap_path, Config),
  757:     {ok, #eldap_search_result{entries=[]}} =
  758: 	eldap:search(H,
  759: 		     #eldap_search{base = BasePath,
  760: 				   filter = eldap:'and'([eldap:substrings("sn", [{any, "a"}]),
  761: 							 eldap:'not'(
  762: 							   eldap:equalityMatch("cn","Foo Bar")
  763: 							  )]),
  764: 				   scope=eldap:singleLevel()}).
  765: 
  766: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  767: search_two_hits(Config) ->
  768:     H = proplists:get_value(handle, Config),
  769:     BasePath = proplists:get_value(eldap_path, Config),
  770:     DN1 = "cn=Santa Claus," ++ BasePath,
  771:     DN2 = "cn=Jultomten," ++ BasePath,
  772:     %% Add two objects:
  773:     ok = eldap:add(H, DN1,
  774: 		   [{"objectclass", ["person"]},
  775: 		    {"cn", ["Santa Claus"]},
  776: 		    {"sn", ["Santa"]},
  777: 		    {"description", ["USA"]}]),
  778:     ok = eldap:add(H, DN2,
  779: 		   [{"objectclass", ["person"]},
  780: 		    {"cn", ["Jultomten"]},
  781: 		    {"sn", ["Tomten"]},
  782: 		    {"description", ["Sweden"]}]),
  783: 
  784:     %% Search for them:
  785:     {ok, #eldap_search_result{entries=Es}} =
  786: 	eldap:search(H,
  787: 		     #eldap_search{base = BasePath,
  788: 				   filter = eldap:present("description"),
  789: 				   scope=eldap:singleLevel()}),
  790: 
  791:     %% And check that they are the expected ones:
  792:     ExpectedDNs = lists:sort([DN1, DN2]),
  793:     ExpectedDNs = lists:sort([D || #eldap_entry{object_name=D} <- Es]),
  794: 
  795:     %% Restore the database:
  796:     [ok=eldap:delete(H,DN) || DN <- ExpectedDNs].
  797: 
  798: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  799: search_extensible_match_with_dn(Config) ->
  800:     H = proplists:get_value(handle, Config),
  801:     BasePath = proplists:get_value(eldap_path, Config),
  802: 
  803:     %% Create intermediate tree
  804:     OU1 = "o=Designers," ++ BasePath,
  805:     ok = eldap:add(H, OU1, [{"objectclass", ["top", "organization"]}, {"o", ["Designers"]}]),
  806:     OU2 = "o=Graphics," ++ BasePath,
  807:     ok = eldap:add(H, OU2, [{"objectclass", ["top", "organization"]}, {"o", ["Graphics"]}]),
  808: 
  809:     %% Add objects, they belongs to different trees
  810:     DN1 = "cn=Bob Noorda,o=Designers," ++ BasePath,
  811:     DN2 = "cn=Bob Noorda,o=Graphics," ++ BasePath,
  812:     ok = eldap:add(H, DN1,
  813:             [{"objectclass", ["person"]},
  814:             {"cn", ["Bob Noorda"]},
  815:             {"sn", ["Noorda"]},
  816:             {"description", ["Amsterdam"]}]),
  817:     ok = eldap:add(H, DN2,
  818:             [{"objectclass", ["person"]},
  819:             {"cn", ["Bob Noorda"]},
  820:             {"sn", ["Noorda"]},
  821:             {"description", ["Milan"]}]),
  822:     
  823:     %% Search using extensible filter only in Designers tree
  824:     Filter = eldap:'and'([
  825:         eldap:extensibleMatch("Designers", [{type, "o"}, {dnAttributes, true}]),
  826:         eldap:equalityMatch("sn", "Noorda")
  827:     ]),
  828:     {ok, #eldap_search_result{entries=Es}} = 
  829:     eldap:search(H, #eldap_search{base = BasePath,
  830:         filter = Filter,
  831:         scope=eldap:wholeSubtree()}),
  832: 
  833:     %% Check
  834:     [DN1] = [D || #eldap_entry{object_name=D} <- Es],
  835: 
  836:     %% Restore the database
  837:     [ok=eldap:delete(H,DN) || DN <- [DN1, DN2, OU1, OU2]].
  838: 
  839: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  840: search_extensible_match_without_dn(Config) ->
  841:     H = proplists:get_value(handle, Config),
  842:     BasePath = proplists:get_value(eldap_path, Config),
  843: 
  844:     %% Create intermediate tree
  845:     OU1 = "o=Teachers," ++ BasePath,
  846:     ok = eldap:add(H, OU1, [{"objectclass", ["top", "organization"]}, {"o", ["Teachers"]}]),
  847:     OU2 = "o=Designers," ++ BasePath,
  848:     ok = eldap:add(H, OU2, [{"objectclass", ["top", "organization"]}, {"o", ["Designers"]}]),
  849: 
  850:     %% Add objects, they belongs to different trees
  851:     DN1 = "cn=Max Huber,o=Teachers," ++ BasePath,
  852:     DN2 = "cn=Max Huber,o=Designers," ++ BasePath,
  853:     ok = eldap:add(H, DN1,
  854:             [{"objectclass", ["person"]},
  855:             {"cn", ["Max Huber"]},
  856:             {"sn", ["Huber"]},
  857:             {"description", ["Baar"]}]),
  858:     ok = eldap:add(H, DN2,
  859:             [{"objectclass", ["person"]},
  860:             {"cn", ["Max Huber"]},
  861:             {"sn", ["Huber"]},
  862:             {"description", ["Milan"]}]),
  863:     
  864:     %% Search using extensible filter without dn attribute
  865:     Filter = eldap:extensibleMatch("Huber", [{type, "sn"}]),
  866:     {ok, #eldap_search_result{entries=Es}} =
  867: 	eldap:search(H, #eldap_search{base = BasePath,
  868:         filter = Filter,
  869:         scope = eldap:wholeSubtree()
  870:     }),
  871: 
  872:     %% And check that they are the expected ones:
  873:     ExpectedDNs = lists:sort([DN1, DN2]),
  874:     ExpectedDNs = lists:sort([D || #eldap_entry{object_name=D} <- Es]),
  875: 
  876:     %% Restore the database:
  877:     [ok=eldap:delete(H,DN) || DN <- [DN1, DN2, OU1, OU2]].
  878: 
  879: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  880: search_referral(Config) ->
  881:     H = proplists:get_value(handle, Config),
  882:     BasePath = proplists:get_value(eldap_path, Config),
  883:     DN = "cn=Santa Claus,dc=notHere," ++ BasePath,
  884:     {ok,{referral,["ldap://nowhere.example.com"++_]}} =
  885: 	eldap:search(H, #eldap_search{base = DN,
  886: 				      filter = eldap:present("description"),
  887: 				      scope=eldap:singleLevel()}).
  888: 
  889: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  890: search_paged_results(Config) ->
  891:     H = proplists:get_value(handle, Config),
  892:     BasePath = proplists:get_value(eldap_path, Config),
  893:     %% Add a lot of objects:
  894:     Desc = "Frogs",
  895:     Names = ["Frog" ++ integer_to_list(N) || N <- lists:seq(1, 20)],
  896:     DNs = [{"cn=Jeremy " ++ N ++ "," ++ BasePath, [{"objectclass", ["person"]},
  897:                                                  {"cn", ["Jeremy " ++ N]},
  898:                                                  {"sn", [N]},
  899:                                                  {"description", [Desc]}]} || N <- Names],
  900:     [ok = eldap:add(H, Entry, Attrs) || {Entry, Attrs} <- DNs],
  901: 
  902:     PageSize = 10,
  903: 
  904:     Control1 = eldap:paged_result_control(PageSize),
  905: 
  906:     {ok, SearchResult1} =
  907:         eldap:search(H,
  908:                      #eldap_search{base = BasePath,
  909:                                    filter = eldap:equalityMatch("description", Desc),
  910:                                    scope=eldap:singleLevel()},
  911:                      [Control1]),
  912: 
  913: 
  914:     #eldap_search_result{entries=Es1} = Res = SearchResult1,
  915: 
  916:     PageSize = length(Es1),
  917: 
  918:     {ok, Cookie1} = eldap:paged_result_cookie(SearchResult1),
  919: 
  920:     Control2 = eldap:paged_result_control(PageSize, Cookie1),
  921: 
  922:     {ok, SearchResult2} =
  923:         eldap:search(H,
  924:                      #eldap_search{base = BasePath,
  925:                                    filter = eldap:equalityMatch("description", Desc),
  926:                                    scope=eldap:singleLevel()},
  927:                      [Control2]),
  928: 
  929:     #eldap_search_result{entries=Es2} = SearchResult2,
  930: 
  931:     PageSize = length(Es2),
  932: 
  933:     %% all results have been returned so cookie should be empty
  934:     {ok, []} = eldap:paged_result_cookie(SearchResult2),
  935: 
  936:     ExpectedDNs = lists:sort([DN || {DN, _} <- DNs]),
  937:     ResultDNs = lists:sort([DN || #eldap_entry{object_name=DN} <- Es1 ++ Es2]),
  938: 
  939:     ExpectedDNs = ResultDNs,
  940: 
  941:     %% Restore the database:
  942:     [ok=eldap:delete(H,DN) || {DN, _} <- DNs].
  943: 
  944: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  945: modify(Config) ->
  946:     H = proplists:get_value(handle, Config),
  947:     BasePath = proplists:get_value(eldap_path, Config),
  948:     %% The object to modify
  949:     DN = "cn=Foo Bar," ++ BasePath,
  950: 
  951:     %% Save a copy to restore later:
  952:     {ok,OriginalAttrs} = attributes(H, DN),
  953: 
  954:     %% Do a change
  955:     Mod = [eldap:mod_replace("telephoneNumber", ["555-12345"]),
  956: 	   eldap:mod_add("description", ["Nice guy"])],
  957:     ok = eldap:modify(H, DN, Mod),
  958: 
  959:     %% Check that the object was changed
  960:     {ok, #eldap_search_result{entries=[#eldap_entry{object_name=DN}]}} =
  961: 	eldap:search(H,
  962: 		     #eldap_search{base = BasePath,
  963: 				   filter = eldap:equalityMatch("telephoneNumber", "555-12345"),
  964: 				   scope=eldap:singleLevel()}),
  965: 
  966:     %% Do another type of change
  967:     ok = eldap:modify(H, DN, [eldap:mod_delete("telephoneNumber", [])]),
  968:     %% and check that it worked by repeating the test above
  969:     {ok, #eldap_search_result{entries=[]}} =
  970: 	eldap:search(H,
  971: 		     #eldap_search{base = BasePath,
  972: 				   filter = eldap:equalityMatch("telephoneNumber", "555-12345"),
  973: 				   scope=eldap:singleLevel()}),
  974:     %% restore the original version:
  975:     restore_original_object(H, DN, OriginalAttrs).
  976: 
  977: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  978: modify_referral(Config) ->
  979:     H = proplists:get_value(handle, Config),
  980:     BasePath = proplists:get_value(eldap_path, Config),
  981:     %% The object to modify
  982:     DN = "cn=Foo Bar,dc=notHere," ++ BasePath,
  983: 
  984:     %% Do a change
  985:     Mod = [eldap:mod_replace("telephoneNumber", ["555-12345"]),
  986: 	   eldap:mod_add("description", ["Nice guy"])],
  987:     {ok,{referral,["ldap://nowhere.example.com"++_]}} =
  988: 	eldap:modify(H, DN, Mod).
  989: 
  990: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  991: delete(Config) ->
  992:     H = proplists:get_value(handle, Config),
  993:     BasePath = proplists:get_value(eldap_path, Config),
  994:     %% The element to play with:
  995:     DN = "cn=Jonas Jonsson," ++ BasePath,
  996: 
  997:     %% Prove that the element is present before deletion
  998:     {ok,OriginalAttrs} = attributes(H, DN),
  999: 
 1000:     %% Do what the test has to do:
 1001:     ok = eldap:delete(H, DN),
 1002:     %% check that it really was deleted:
 1003:     {error, noSuchObject} = eldap:delete(H, DN),
 1004: 
 1005:     %% And restore the object for subsequent tests
 1006:     restore_original_object(H, DN, OriginalAttrs).
 1007: 
 1008: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
 1009: delete_referral(Config) ->
 1010:     H = proplists:get_value(handle, Config),
 1011:     BasePath = proplists:get_value(eldap_path, Config),
 1012:     %% The element to play with:
 1013:     DN = "cn=Jonas Jonsson,dc=notHere," ++ BasePath,
 1014:     {ok,{referral,["ldap://nowhere.example.com"++_]}} = eldap:delete(H, DN).
 1015: 
 1016: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
 1017: modify_dn_delete_old(Config) ->
 1018:     H = proplists:get_value(handle, Config),
 1019:     BasePath = proplists:get_value(eldap_path, Config),
 1020:     OrigCN = "Foo Bar",
 1021:     OriginalRDN = "cn="++OrigCN,
 1022:     DN = OriginalRDN ++ "," ++ BasePath,
 1023:     NewCN = "Niclas Andre",
 1024:     NewRDN = "cn="++NewCN,
 1025:     NewDN = NewRDN ++ "," ++BasePath,
 1026: 
 1027:     %% Check that the object to modify_dn of exists:
 1028:     {ok,OriginalAttrs} = attributes(H, DN),
 1029:     CN_orig = lists:sort(proplists:get_value("cn",OriginalAttrs)),
 1030:     {ok, #eldap_search_result{entries=[#eldap_entry{object_name=DN}]}} =
 1031: 	eldap:search(H,
 1032: 		     #eldap_search{base = BasePath,
 1033: 				   filter = eldap:substrings("sn", [{any, "a"}]),
 1034: 				   scope = eldap:singleLevel()}),
 1035: 
 1036:     %% Modify and delete the old one:
 1037:     ok = eldap:modify_dn(H, DN, NewRDN, true, ""),
 1038: 
 1039:     %% Check that DN was modified and the old one was deleted:
 1040:     {ok,NewAttrs} = attributes(H, NewDN),
 1041:     CN_new = lists:sort(proplists:get_value("cn",NewAttrs)),
 1042:     {ok, #eldap_search_result{entries=[#eldap_entry{object_name=NewDN}]}} =
 1043: 	eldap:search(H,
 1044: 		     #eldap_search{base = BasePath,
 1045: 				   filter = eldap:substrings("sn", [{any, "a"}]),
 1046: 				   scope = eldap:singleLevel()}),
 1047:     %% What we expect:
 1048:     CN_new = lists:sort([NewCN | CN_orig -- [OrigCN]]),
 1049: 
 1050:     %% Change back:
 1051:     ok = eldap:modify_dn(H, NewDN, OriginalRDN, true, ""),
 1052: 
 1053:     %% Check that DN was modified and the new one was deleted:
 1054:     {ok,SameAsOriginalAttrs} = attributes(H, DN),
 1055:     CN_orig = lists:sort(proplists:get_value("cn",SameAsOriginalAttrs)),
 1056:     {ok, #eldap_search_result{entries=[#eldap_entry{object_name=DN}]}} =
 1057: 	eldap:search(H,
 1058: 		     #eldap_search{base = BasePath,
 1059: 				   filter = eldap:substrings("sn", [{any, "a"}]),
 1060: 				   scope = eldap:singleLevel()}).
 1061: 
 1062: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
 1063: modify_dn_keep_old(Config) ->
 1064:     H = proplists:get_value(handle, Config),
 1065:     BasePath = proplists:get_value(eldap_path, Config),
 1066:     OriginalRDN = "cn=Foo Bar",
 1067:     DN = OriginalRDN ++ "," ++ BasePath,
 1068:     NewCN = "Niclas Andre",
 1069:     NewRDN = "cn="++NewCN,
 1070:     NewDN = NewRDN ++ "," ++BasePath,
 1071: 
 1072:     %% Check that the object to modify_dn of exists but the new one does not:
 1073:     {ok,OriginalAttrs} = attributes(H, DN),
 1074:     {ok, #eldap_search_result{entries=[#eldap_entry{object_name=DN}]}} =
 1075: 	eldap:search(H,
 1076: 		     #eldap_search{base = BasePath,
 1077: 				   filter = eldap:substrings("sn", [{any, "a"}]),
 1078: 				   scope = eldap:singleLevel()}),
 1079: 
 1080:     %% Modify but keep the old "cn" attr:
 1081:     ok = eldap:modify_dn(H, DN, NewRDN, false, ""),
 1082: 
 1083:     %% Check that DN was modified and the old CN entry is not deleted:
 1084:     {ok,NewAttrs} = attributes(H, NewDN),
 1085:     CN_orig = proplists:get_value("cn",OriginalAttrs),
 1086:     CN_new = proplists:get_value("cn",NewAttrs),
 1087:     Expected = lists:sort([NewCN|CN_orig]),
 1088:     Expected = lists:sort(CN_new),
 1089: 
 1090:     %% Restore db:
 1091:     ok = eldap:delete(H, NewDN),
 1092:     restore_original_object(H, DN, OriginalAttrs).
 1093: 
 1094: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
 1095: %%% Test that start_tls on an already upgraded connection makes no noise
 1096: start_tls_twice_should_fail(Config) ->
 1097:     {ok,H} = open_bind(Config),
 1098:     {error,tls_already_started} = eldap:start_tls(H, []),
 1099:     eldap:close(H).
 1100: 
 1101: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
 1102: %%% Test that start_tls on an ldaps connection fails
 1103: start_tls_on_ssl_should_fail(Config) ->
 1104:     {ok,H} = open_bind(Config),
 1105:     {error,tls_already_started} = eldap:start_tls(H, []),
 1106:     eldap:close(H).
 1107: 
 1108: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
 1109: encode(_Config) ->
 1110:     {ok,Bin} = 'ELDAPv3':encode('AddRequest', #'AddRequest'{entry="hejHopp"  ,attributes=[]} ),
 1111:     Expected = <<104,11,4,7,104,101,106,72,111,112,112,48,0>>,
 1112:     case Bin of
 1113: 	Expected -> ok;
 1114: 	_ -> ct:log("Encoded erroneously to:~n~p~nExpected:~n~p",[Bin,Expected]),
 1115: 	     {fail, "Bad encode"}
 1116:     end.
 1117: 
 1118: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
 1119: decode(_Config) ->
 1120:     {ok,Res} = 'ELDAPv3':decode('AddRequest', <<104,11,4,7,104,101,106,72,111,112,112,48,0>>),
 1121:     ct:log("Res = ~p", [Res]),
 1122:     Expected = #'AddRequest'{entry = "hejHopp",attributes = []},
 1123:     case Res of
 1124: 	Expected -> ok;
 1125: 	#'AddRequest'{entry= <<"hejHopp">>, attributes=[]} ->
 1126: 	    {fail, "decoded to (correct) binary!!"};
 1127: 	_ ->
 1128: 	    {fail, "Bad decode"}
 1129:     end.
 1130: 
 1131: 
 1132: 
 1133: %%%****************************************************************
 1134: %%% Private
 1135: 
 1136: attributes(H, DN) ->
 1137:     case eldap:search(H,
 1138: 		     #eldap_search{base  = DN,
 1139: 				   filter= eldap:present("objectclass"),
 1140: 				   scope = eldap:wholeSubtree()}) of
 1141: 	{ok, #eldap_search_result{entries=[#eldap_entry{object_name=DN,
 1142: 							attributes=OriginalAttrs}]}} ->
 1143: 	    {ok, OriginalAttrs};
 1144: 	Other ->
 1145: 	    Other
 1146:     end.
 1147: 
 1148: restore_original_object(H, DN, Attrs) ->
 1149:     eldap:delete(H, DN),
 1150:     ok = eldap:add(H, DN, Attrs).
 1151: 
 1152: 
 1153: find_first_server(UseSSL, [{config,Key}|Ss]) ->
 1154:     case ct:get_config(Key) of
 1155: 	{Host,Port} ->
 1156: 	    ct:log("find_first_server config ~p -> ~p",[Key,{Host,Port}]),
 1157: 	    find_first_server(UseSSL, [{Host,Port}|Ss]);
 1158: 	undefined ->
 1159: 	    ct:log("find_first_server config ~p is undefined",[Key]),
 1160: 	    find_first_server(UseSSL, Ss)
 1161:     end;
 1162: find_first_server(UseSSL, [{Host,Port}|Ss]) ->
 1163:     case eldap:open([Host],[{port,Port},{ssl,UseSSL},{timeout,10000}]) of
 1164: 	{ok,H} when UseSSL==false, Ss=/=[] ->
 1165: 	    case eldap:start_tls(H, [], 10000) of
 1166: 		ok ->
 1167: 		    ct:log("find_first_server ~p UseSSL=~p -> ok",[{Host,Port},UseSSL]),
 1168: 		    eldap:close(H),
 1169: 		    {Host,Port};
 1170: 		Res ->
 1171: 		    ct:log("find_first_server ~p UseSSL=~p failed with~n~p~nSave as spare host.",[{Host,Port},UseSSL,Res]),
 1172: 		    eldap:close(H),
 1173: 		    find_first_server(UseSSL, Ss++[{spare_host,Host,Port}])
 1174: 	    end;
 1175: 	{ok,H} ->
 1176: 	    ct:log("find_first_server ~p UseSSL=~p -> ok",[{Host,Port},UseSSL]),
 1177: 	    eldap:close(H),
 1178: 	    {Host,Port};
 1179: 	Res ->
 1180: 	    ct:log("find_first_server ~p UseSSL=~p failed with~n~p",[{Host,Port},UseSSL,Res]),
 1181: 	    find_first_server(UseSSL, Ss)
 1182:     end;
 1183: find_first_server(false, [{spare_host,Host,Port}|_]) ->
 1184:     ct:log("find_first_server can't find start_tls host, use the spare non-start_tls host for plain ldap: ~p",[{Host,Port}]),
 1185:     {Host,Port};
 1186: find_first_server(_, []) ->
 1187:     ct:log("find_first_server, nothing left to try",[]),
 1188:     undefined.
 1189: 
 1190: initialize_db(Config) ->
 1191:     case {open_bind(Config), inet:gethostname()} of
 1192: 	{{ok,H}, {ok,MyHost}} ->
 1193: 	    Path = "dc="++MyHost++",dc=ericsson,dc=se",
 1194: 	    delete_old_contents(H, Path),
 1195: 	    add_new_contents(H, Path, MyHost),
 1196: 	    eldap:close(H),
 1197: 	    [{eldap_path,Path}|Config];
 1198: 	Other ->
 1199: 	    ct:fail("initialize_db failed: ~p",[Other])
 1200:     end.
 1201: 
 1202: clear_db(Config) ->
 1203:     {ok,H} = open_bind(Config),
 1204:     Path = proplists:get_value(eldap_path, Config),
 1205:     delete_old_contents(H, Path),
 1206:     eldap:close(H),
 1207:     Config.
 1208: 
 1209: delete_old_contents(H, Path) ->
 1210:     case eldap:search(H, [{base,  Path},
 1211: 			  {filter, eldap:present("objectclass")},
 1212: 			  {scope,  eldap:wholeSubtree()}])
 1213:     of
 1214: 	{ok, _R=#eldap_search_result{entries=Entries}} ->
 1215: 	    case eldap:delete(H, "dc=notHere,"++Path, [?manageDsaIT]) of
 1216: 		ok -> ok;
 1217: 		{error,noSuchObject} -> ok;
 1218: 		Other -> ct:fail("eldap:delete notHere ret ~p",[Other])
 1219: 	    end,
 1220: 	    [ok = eldap:delete(H,DN) || #eldap_entry{object_name=DN} <- Entries];
 1221: 	_Res ->
 1222: 	    ignore
 1223:     end.
 1224: 
 1225: 
 1226: -define(ok(X), ok(?MODULE,?LINE,X)).
 1227: 
 1228: add_new_contents(H, Path, MyHost) ->
 1229:     ?ok(eldap:add(H,"dc=ericsson,dc=se",
 1230: 		 [{"objectclass", ["dcObject", "organization"]},
 1231: 		  {"dc", ["ericsson"]},
 1232: 		  {"o", ["Testing"]}])),
 1233:     ?ok(eldap:add(H,Path,
 1234: 		 [{"objectclass", ["dcObject", "organization"]},
 1235: 		  {"dc", [MyHost]},
 1236: 		  {"o", ["Test machine"]}])),
 1237:     ?ok(eldap:add(H,  "dc=notHere,"++Path,
 1238: 		  [{"objectclass", ["referral", 
 1239: 				    "dcObject"
 1240: 				   ]},
 1241: 		   {"ref", ["ldap://nowhere.example.com/notHere,"++Path]},
 1242: 		   {"dc", ["notHere"]}
 1243: 		  ])).
 1244: 
 1245: 
 1246: 
 1247: ok(_, _, {error,entryAlreadyExists}) -> ok;
 1248: ok(_, _, ok) -> ok;
 1249: ok(MODULE, LINE, X) -> 
 1250:     ct:pal("~p:~p add_new_contents: ret from eldap:add = ~p",[MODULE,LINE,X]),
 1251:     X.
 1252: 
 1253: 
 1254: 
 1255: cond_start_tls(H, Config) ->
 1256:     case proplists:get_value(start_tls,Config) of
 1257: 	true -> start_tls(H,Config);
 1258: 	_ -> Config
 1259:     end.
 1260: 
 1261: start_tls(H, Config) ->
 1262:     KeyFile = filename:join([proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),
 1263: 			     "certs/client/key.pem"
 1264: 			    ]),
 1265:     case eldap:start_tls(H, [{keyfile, KeyFile}]) of
 1266: 	ok ->
 1267: 	    [{start_tls_success,true} | Config];
 1268: 	Error ->
 1269: 	    ct:log("Start_tls on ~p failed: ~p",[proplists:get_value(url,Config) ,Error]),
 1270: 	    ct:fail("start_tls failed")
 1271:     end.
 1272: 
 1273: 
 1274: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
 1275: open_bind(Config) ->
 1276:     {ok,H} = open(Config),
 1277:     ok = eldap:simple_bind(H, "cn=Manager,dc=ericsson,dc=se", "hejsan"),
 1278:     {ok,H}.
 1279: 
 1280: open(Config) ->
 1281:     {Host,Port} = proplists:get_value(server,Config),
 1282:     SSLflag = proplists:get_value(ssl_flag,Config),
 1283:     {ok,H} = eldap:open([Host], [{port,Port},{ssl,SSLflag}]),
 1284:     cond_start_tls(H, Config),
 1285:     {ok,H}.
 1286: 
 1287: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
 1288: supported_extension(OID, Config) ->
 1289:     {ok,H} = open_bind(Config),
 1290:     case eldap:search(H, [{scope,  eldap:baseObject()},
 1291: 			  {filter, eldap:present("objectclass")},
 1292: 			  {deref,  eldap:neverDerefAliases()},
 1293: 			  {attributes, ["+"]}]) of
 1294: 	{ok,R=#eldap_search_result{}} ->
 1295: 	    eldap:close(H),
 1296: 	    lists:member(OID,
 1297: 			 [SE || EE <- R#eldap_search_result.entries,
 1298: 				{"supportedExtension",SEs} <- EE#eldap_entry.attributes,
 1299: 				SE<-SEs]);
 1300: 	_ ->
 1301: 	    eldap:close(H),
 1302: 	    false
 1303:     end.
 1304: 
 1305: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
 1306: client_timeout(Fun, Config) ->
 1307:     Host = proplists:get_value(listen_host, Config),
 1308:     Port = proplists:get_value(listen_port, Config),
 1309:     Opts = proplists:get_value(tcp_connect_opts, Config),
 1310:     T = 1000,
 1311:     case eldap:open([Host], [{timeout,T},{port,Port}|Opts]) of
 1312: 	{ok,H} ->
 1313: 	    T0 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 1314: 	    {error,{gen_tcp_error,timeout}} = Fun(H),
 1315: 	    T_op = ms_passed(T0),
 1316: 	    ct:log("Time = ~p, Timeout spec = ~p",[T_op,T]),
 1317: 	    if
 1318: 		T_op < T ->
 1319: 		    {fail, "Timeout too early"};
 1320: 		true ->
 1321: 		    ok
 1322: 	    end;
 1323: 
 1324: 	Other -> ct:fail("eldap:open failed: ~p",[Other])
 1325:     end.
 1326: 
 1327: %% Help function, elapsed milliseconds since T0
 1328: ms_passed(T0) ->
 1329:     %% OTP 18
 1330:     erlang:convert_time_unit(erlang:monotonic_time() - T0,
 1331: 			     native,
 1332: 			     micro_seconds) / 1000.
 1333: 
 1334: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
 1335: init_ssl_certs_et_al(Config) ->
 1336:     try ssl:start()
 1337:     of
 1338: 	R when R==ok ; R=={error,{already_started,ssl}} ->
 1339: 	    try make_certs:all("/dev/null",
 1340: 			       filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config), "certs"))
 1341: 	    of
 1342: 		{ok,_} -> true;
 1343: 		Other ->
 1344: 		    ct:comment("make_certs failed"),
 1345: 		    ct:log("make_certs failed ~p", [Other]),
 1346: 		    false
 1347: 	    catch
 1348: 		C:E ->
 1349: 		    ct:comment("make_certs crashed"),
 1350: 		    ct:log("make_certs failed ~p:~p", [C,E]),
 1351: 		    false
 1352: 	    end;
 1353: 	_ ->
 1354: 	    false
 1355:     catch
 1356: 	Error:Reason ->
 1357: 	    ct:comment("ssl failed to start"),
 1358: 	    ct:log("init_per_suite failed to start ssl Error=~p Reason=~p", [Error, Reason]),
 1359: 	    false
 1360:     end.
 1361: 
 1362: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
 1363: random_sorted(L) when is_list(L) ->
 1364:     random_sorted(L, length(L), []).
 1365: 
 1366: random_sorted([], 0, Acc) -> Acc;
 1367: random_sorted(L, N, Acc) ->
 1368:     R = rand:uniform(N),
 1369:     E = lists:nth(R, L),
 1370:     random_sorted(L -- [E], N-1, [E|Acc]).
